00007 """Argument-less script to select what to run on the buildbots."""

00010 import filecmp
00011 import os
00012 import shutil
00013 import subprocess
00014 import sys

00017 if sys.platform in ['win32', 'cygwin']:
00018   EXE_SUFFIX = '.exe'
00019 else:
00020   EXE_SUFFIX = ''

00023 BUILDBOT_DIR = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
00024 TRUNK_DIR = os.path.dirname(BUILDBOT_DIR)
00025 ROOT_DIR = os.path.dirname(TRUNK_DIR)
00026 ANDROID_DIR = os.path.join(ROOT_DIR, 'android')
00027 CMAKE_DIR = os.path.join(ROOT_DIR, 'cmake')
00028 CMAKE_BIN_DIR = os.path.join(CMAKE_DIR, 'bin')
00029 OUT_DIR = os.path.join(TRUNK_DIR, 'out')
00030 
00031 
00032 def CallSubProcess(*args, **kwargs):
00033   """Wrapper around subprocess.call which treats errors as build exceptions."""
00034   with open(os.devnull) as devnull_fd:
00035     retcode = subprocess.call(stdin=devnull_fd, *args, **kwargs)
00036   if retcode != 0:
00037     print '@@@STEP_EXCEPTION@@@'
00038     sys.exit(1)
00039 
00040 
00041 def PrepareCmake():
00042   """Build CMake 2.8.8 since the version in Precise is 2.8.7."""
00043   if os.environ['BUILDBOT_CLOBBER'] == '1':
00044     print '@@@BUILD_STEP Clobber CMake checkout@@@'
00045     shutil.rmtree(CMAKE_DIR)
00046 
00047   # We always build CMake 2.8.8, so no need to do anything
00048   # if the directory already exists.
00049   if os.path.isdir(CMAKE_DIR):
00050     return
00051 
00052   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Initialize CMake checkout@@@'
00053   os.mkdir(CMAKE_DIR)
00054 
00055   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Sync CMake@@@'
00056   CallSubProcess(
00057       ['git', 'clone',
00058        '--depth', '1',
00059        '--single-branch',
00060        '--branch', 'v2.8.8',
00061        '--',
00062        'git://cmake.org/cmake.git',
00063        CMAKE_DIR],
00064       cwd=CMAKE_DIR)
00065 
00066   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Build CMake@@@'
00067   CallSubProcess(
00068       ['/bin/bash', 'bootstrap', '--prefix=%s' % CMAKE_DIR],
00069       cwd=CMAKE_DIR)
00070 
00071   CallSubProcess( ['make', 'cmake'], cwd=CMAKE_DIR)
00072 
00073 
00074 _ANDROID_SETUP = 'source build/envsetup.sh && lunch full-eng'
00075 
00076 
00077 def PrepareAndroidTree():
00078   """Prepare an Android tree to run 'android' format tests."""
00079   if os.environ['BUILDBOT_CLOBBER'] == '1':
00080     print '@@@BUILD_STEP Clobber Android checkout@@@'
00081     shutil.rmtree(ANDROID_DIR)
00082 
00083   # (Re)create the directory so that the following steps will succeed.
00084   if not os.path.isdir(ANDROID_DIR):
00085     os.mkdir(ANDROID_DIR)
00086 
00087   # We use a manifest from the gyp project listing pinned revisions of AOSP to
00088   # use, to ensure that we test against a stable target. This needs to be
00089   # updated to pick up new build system changes sometimes, so we must test if
00090   # it has changed.
00091   manifest_filename = 'aosp_manifest.xml'
00092   gyp_manifest = os.path.join(BUILDBOT_DIR, manifest_filename)
00093   android_manifest = os.path.join(ANDROID_DIR, '.repo', 'manifests',
00094                                   manifest_filename)
00095   manifest_is_current = (os.path.isfile(android_manifest) and
00096                          filecmp.cmp(gyp_manifest, android_manifest))
00097   if not manifest_is_current:
00098     # It's safe to repeat these steps, so just do them again to make sure we are
00099     # in a good state.
00100     print '@@@BUILD_STEP Initialize Android checkout@@@'
00101     CallSubProcess(
00102         ['repo', 'init',
00103          '-u', 'https://android.googlesource.com/platform/manifest',
00104          '-b', 'master',
00105          '-g', 'all,-notdefault,-device,-darwin,-mips,-x86'],
00106         cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00107     shutil.copy(gyp_manifest, android_manifest)
00108 
00109     print '@@@BUILD_STEP Sync Android@@@'
00110     CallSubProcess(['repo', 'sync', '-j4', '-m', manifest_filename],
00111                    cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00112 
00113   # If we already built the system image successfully and didn't sync to a new
00114   # version of the source, skip running the build again as it's expensive even
00115   # when there's nothing to do.
00116   system_img = os.path.join(ANDROID_DIR, 'out', 'target', 'product', 'generic',
00117                             'system.img')
00118   if manifest_is_current and os.path.isfile(system_img):
00119     return
00120 
00121   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Build Android@@@'
00122   CallSubProcess(
00123       ['/bin/bash',
00124        '-c', '%s && make -j4' % _ANDROID_SETUP],
00125       cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00126 
00127 
00128 def StartAndroidEmulator():
00129   """Start an android emulator from the built android tree."""
00130   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Start Android emulator@@@'
00131 
00132   CallSubProcess(['/bin/bash', '-c',
00133       '%s && adb kill-server ' % _ANDROID_SETUP],
00134       cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00135 
00136   # If taskset is available, use it to force adbd to run only on one core, as,
00137   # sadly, it improves its reliability (see crbug.com/268450).
00138   adbd_wrapper = ''
00139   with open(os.devnull, 'w') as devnull_fd:
00140     if subprocess.call(['which', 'taskset'], stdout=devnull_fd) == 0:
00141       adbd_wrapper = 'taskset -c 0'
00142   CallSubProcess(['/bin/bash', '-c',
00143       '%s && %s adb start-server ' % (_ANDROID_SETUP, adbd_wrapper)],
00144       cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00145 
00146   subprocess.Popen(
00147       ['/bin/bash', '-c',
00148        '%s && emulator -no-window' % _ANDROID_SETUP],
00149       cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00150   CallSubProcess(
00151       ['/bin/bash', '-c',
00152        '%s && adb wait-for-device' % _ANDROID_SETUP],
00153       cwd=ANDROID_DIR)
00154 
00155 
00156 def StopAndroidEmulator():
00157   """Stop all android emulators."""
00158   print '@@@BUILD_STEP Stop Android emulator@@@'
00159   # If this fails, it's because there is no emulator running.
00160   subprocess.call(['pkill', 'emulator.*'])
00161 
00162 
00163 def GypTestFormat(title, format=None, msvs_version=None, tests=[]):
00164   """Run the gyp tests for a given format, emitting annotator tags.
00165 
00166   See annotator docs at:
00167     https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/dev/developers/testing/chromium-build-infrastructure/buildbot-annotations
00168   Args:
00169     format: gyp format to test.
00170   Returns:
00171     0 for sucesss, 1 for failure.
00172   """
00173   if not format:
00174     format = title
00175 
00176   print '@@@BUILD_STEP ' + title + '@@@'
00177   sys.stdout.flush()
00178   env = os.environ.copy()
00179   if msvs_version:
00180     env['GYP_MSVS_VERSION'] = msvs_version
00181   command = ' '.join(
00182       [sys.executable, 'gyp/gyptest.py',
00183        '--all',
00184        '--passed',
00185        '--format', format,
00186        '--path', CMAKE_BIN_DIR,
00187        '--chdir', 'gyp'] + tests)
00188   if format == 'android':
00189     # gyptest needs the environment setup from envsetup/lunch in order to build
00190     # using the 'android' backend, so this is done in a single shell.
00191     retcode = subprocess.call(
00192         ['/bin/bash',
00193          '-c', '%s && cd %s && %s' % (_ANDROID_SETUP, ROOT_DIR, command)],
00194         cwd=ANDROID_DIR, env=env)
00195   else:
00196     retcode = subprocess.call(command, cwd=ROOT_DIR, env=env, shell=True)
00197   if retcode:
00198     # Emit failure tag, and keep going.
00199     print '@@@STEP_FAILURE@@@'
00200     return 1
00201   return 0
00202 
00203 
00204 def GypBuild():
00205   # Dump out/ directory.
00206   print '@@@BUILD_STEP cleanup@@@'
00207   print 'Removing %s...' % OUT_DIR
00208   shutil.rmtree(OUT_DIR, ignore_errors=True)
00209   print 'Done.'
00210 
00211   retcode = 0
00212   # The Android gyp bot runs on linux so this must be tested first.
00213   if os.environ['BUILDBOT_BUILDERNAME'] == 'gyp-android':
00214     PrepareAndroidTree()
00215     StartAndroidEmulator()
00216     try:
00217       retcode += GypTestFormat('android')
00218     finally:
00219       StopAndroidEmulator()
00220   elif sys.platform.startswith('linux'):
00221     retcode += GypTestFormat('ninja')
00222     retcode += GypTestFormat('make')
00223     PrepareCmake()
00224     retcode += GypTestFormat('cmake')
00225   elif sys.platform == 'darwin':
00226     retcode += GypTestFormat('ninja')
00227     retcode += GypTestFormat('xcode')
00228     retcode += GypTestFormat('make')
00229   elif sys.platform == 'win32':
00230     retcode += GypTestFormat('ninja')
00231     if os.environ['BUILDBOT_BUILDERNAME'] == 'gyp-win64':
00232       retcode += GypTestFormat('msvs-ninja-2013', format='msvs-ninja',
00233                                msvs_version='2013',
00234                                tests=[
00235                                   r'test\generator-output\gyptest-actions.py',
00236                                   r'test\generator-output\gyptest-relocate.py',
00237                                   r'test\generator-output\gyptest-rules.py'])
00238       retcode += GypTestFormat('msvs-2013', format='msvs', msvs_version='2013')
00239   else:
00240     raise Exception('Unknown platform')
00241   if retcode:
00242     # TODO(bradnelson): once the annotator supports a postscript (section for
00243     #     after the build proper that could be used for cumulative failures),
00244     #     use that instead of this. This isolates the final return value so
00245     #     that it isn't misattributed to the last stage.
00246     print '@@@BUILD_STEP failures@@@'
00247     sys.exit(retcode)
00248 
00249 
00250 if __name__ == '__main__':
00251   GypBuild()
